name: Holla-Deck Fantasies(NSFW 18+)
description:
NOT FOR KIDS!!
FUN FUN FUN!!!
I am currently working on a prototype holodeck fantasy game.
My goal is to make a 3D maze type puzzle game where all sorts of unusual things happen.
Currently I am offering 2 3d non-interactive scenes for free.
Fully interactive scenes should be ready by the end of Sept 2019
The simple demo scenes are free, but the regular game will not be
NOTE: I am starting a Kickstarter campaign that will have extremely fantastic and hilarious featured versions of the game.
Again, this is a product under development and is not a completed product until mid/late Oct 2019.
COMING SOON!!!
this progress has not been released yet..
